[
    FullOpeningTag(
        Span {
            line: 1,
            column: 1,
            position: 0,
        },
    ),
    Expression {
        expression: Variable(
            VariableVariable(
                VariableVariable {
                    span: Span {
                        line: 1,
                        column: 7,
                        position: 6,
                    },
                    variable: SimpleVariable(
                        SimpleVariable {
                            span: Span {
                                line: 1,
                                column: 8,
                                position: 7,
                            },
                            name: "$a",
                        },
                    ),
                },
            ),
        ),
        ending: Semicolon(
            Span {
                line: 1,
                column: 10,
                position: 9,
            },
        ),
    },
]
